title: Epipal: Epilepsy Seizure Alert
description:
Epipal: Detect Seizures, Send Seizure Alerts To Your Family. Manage Epilepsy. Take Control. 

SAFETY WITH SEIZURE & FALL DETECTION

Epipal is the ultimate seizure tracker. Epipal runs in the background and monitors sensors in your phone (and optionally watch) and attempts to detect convulsions associated with seizures, and different types of falls (drop seizures). When an emergency situation is suspected, an alarm is triggered, and if not disarmed within a preset time, an alert notification is automatically sent to your emergency contacts.

MANAGE EPILEPSY TOGETHER

Epipal is a collaborative seizure tracker and your family’s companion for managing seizures & epilepsy and keeping your loved one safe. Epipal groups family and close caregivers together you can manage epilepsy as a team and stay safe, confident and connected! 

CONFIDENCE WITH SHARED MEDICATION REMINDERS

As more than just a seizure tracker, you can use Epipal to get shared epilepsy medicine reminders. As a team you and your family can stay on top of your medications and monitor and log if they have been taken. Over time, Epipal will help you understand how effective different medicines are for you.

MANAGE EPILEPSY WITH A COLLABORATIVE SEIZURE TRACKER JOURNAL

Epipal is an effective seizure tracker. Our shared journal allows you to log seizures and events. Anyone in the Epipal family circle can add events to this shared journal, or add triggers or details to a seizure event, making for an easy and collaborative seizure tracker process.

CONNECTION WITH EMERGENCY BUTTON

An aura button is provided so with two simple taps your loved one can send an alert to the entire Epipal family circle if you feel a seizure coming.

If you are looking for a trusted seizure tracker, seizure detector and epilepsy management tool, then Epipal is for you. We are standing by to help answer any questions you may have. Email epipalapp@gmail.com or visit epipalapp.com to get answers and advice from the Epipal team. 

Please note that Epipal: Epilepsy Seizure Alert is not a medical device and we do not give any clinical recommendations or make any diagnoses. Epipal: Epilepsy Seizure Alert should not be used as a substitute for a medical device or clinical treatment.

Epipal is available for download on Wear OS.

Disclaimer: any users of Epipal: Epilepsy Seizure Alert should get their health advice from a doctor.
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
